name: In re ADOPTION OF K.L.R.F. Appeals of D.A.E. (at No. 11) and K.L.R.F., a minor child (at No. 12)

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeals dismissed as moot.
HUTCHINSON, Former Justice did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James P. O’Connell, Neighborhood Legal Services, Aliquippa, for V.R.F.W.

casebody.head_matter:
533 A.2d 708
In re ADOPTION OF K.L.R.F. Appeals of D.A.E. (at No. 11) and K.L.R.F., a minor child (at No. 12).

Argued Sept. 21, 1987.
Decided Dec. 2, 1987.
